channel.title: Operation on NGENUITY™ 3D Visualization System User Guide
channel.description: Recent content in Operation on NGENUITY™ 3D Visualization System User Guide

item.title: End Case
item.description: When the case is complete, click End Case. Recordings stop and the following prompts appear: If any imaging mode changes were made during the case, select Yes to save the changes or No to delete the changes. If desired, save recorded video. To save a copy of the video to an external hard drive, connect one to a side panel USB connector. If a patient profile was not selected, enter patient information.
